mosinstall.name: 存档内容
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: This module shows a list of the calendar months, which contain Archived items. After you have changed the status of a Content Item to 'Archived' this list will be automatically generated.

param.name: cache
param.label: 启用缓存
param.description: 是否为本模块的内容使用缓存

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: 模块css后缀
param.description: 用来定义模块的css类型(table.moduletable)的后缀，这样允许模块使用单独的css风格
